name: Tormentor Exarch
originalText: When Tormentor Exarch enters the battlefield, choose one — Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn; or target creature gets -0/-2 until end of turn.
text:
When Tormentor Exarch enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
• Target creature gets -0/-2 until end of turn.
